summary: I WAS DRIVING ALONG IN MY 2005, FORD F-150 PICK-UP TRUCK ABOUT TO MAKE A STOP WHEN THE PASSENGER SIDE WINDOW JUST FELL INTO THE DOOR, IT SOUNDED LIKE A SMALL EXPLOSION FRIGHTENING MYSELF AND MY WIFE WHO WAS A PASSENGER. I HAVE READ TO MANY STORIES CONCERNING THE PROBLEMS WITH THE WINDOWS FALLING TO NOT REPORT THIS ONE. IF IT HAVE NOT HAPPEN YET, THERE IS THE POSSIBILITY OF ONE OF THESE GLASSES BREAKING AND FLYING OUT OF THE WINDOW FRAME BECAUSE MY GLASS TEMPORARILY HUNG AT AN AWKWARD POSITION PREMATURELY BEFORE DROPPING DOWN INTO DOOR FRAME.
